name: Denny's 55+ Menu
description: Special 55+ menu with smaller portions at value prices
fullDescription: Denny's offers a dedicated 55+ menu with smaller portions at reduced prices. Available at all locations for guests aged 55 and older.
whatTheyOffer:
- Dedicated 55+ menu with value pricing
- Smaller portion sizes
- Popular breakfast and entr√©e options
- Available all day
- 15% off on designated senior discount days at some locations
howToGetIt:
1. Visit any Denny's location
2. Request the 55+ menu
3. Ages 55 and older eligible
4. Order from special menu
5. Enjoy reduced pricing on select items
keywords: Denny's, senior discount, 55+, senior menu, restaurant, breakfast, affordable meals
